summary: This mod changes Harbinger's Quarters in Jorrvaskr to be more livable with plenty of custom storage and a secret room.
descriptionHtml:
This mod changes Harbinger's Quarters in Jorrvaskr to be more livable with plenty of custom storage and a secret room.

Plan for this mod was to create a proper living quarters for my Companion character with enough storage to store all loot and to stay close to vanilla look of this place.

All items in Harbinger's room are now static with few exceptions (daedra heart, giant's toe and 2 books on the table - those items are lootable with disabled havok). Display cases, wardrobe and suspicious cabinet requires a key which is located in final room of Ysgramor's Tomb. You can now store weapons in display cases.
All containers are set to CompanionsHarbingerFaction so before you became Harbinger it counts as stealing. Most of containers contains items from leveled list just to not make it too empty.
Bed gives well rested bonus.

There's a secret room containing alchemy and enchanting stations with storage for ingredients, potions, poisons, recipes, soul gems and regular chest. There's also weapons rack for few weapons.

In bedroom there's wardrobe with separate containers for armor, helmets, gauntlets, clothes and boots.

In study there are containers for weapons, books, scrolls, journals, notes, crafting supplies, food, dishes and regular strongbox.



All containers are safe. There shouldn't be any problems if you install it during Companions questline. It's fully navmeshed. Cleaned with TES5Edit.
author: balcer
